node.title: Why this family is keeping a ceremonial fire burning at the Carmichael mine
node.alt: three men with ingidenous body paint look at the camera while sitting cross legged with a mine in the background
node.description: After years of controversy, the Carmichael mine is weeks away from exporting coal. But the fight's not over for this group who fear cultural heritage sites are in danger of being lost.
node.content:
["As the first coal mine in Australia's Galilee Basin grows larger each day, so too does the determination of a group of traditional owners living in a makeshift camp dwarfed by the black pit.", "Standing in stark contrast to the Carmichael mine's machinery and worker accommodation is a stone circle set up at the site in remote central Queensland.", "For almost three months, a ceremonial fire's been burning and a traditional owner has sat within the space.", "\"Adani think I'm trying to stop first coal \u2013 but that's not it,\" Wangan and Jagalingou man\u00a0Coedie McAvoy says.\u00a0", "Bravus, the Australian arm of Adani, is weeks away from exporting its first shipment of coal.", "But fresh concerns about the company's clearing of cultural heritage sites are further dividing traditional owners split over their support for the project.", "", "
Police officers have attended the protest camp but did not remove the group.(Supplied: Coedie McAvoy)
", "
Minister considers stop work order
", "Mr McAvoy and his family have been living at the site to perform a ceremony within the \"bora\"\u00a0circle called Waddananggu, which translates to \"the talking\".", "It's been manned through hot days and long nights.", "The group hopes to spark conversation, treaty and connection.", "", "
Wangan and Jagalingou people have been carrying out traditional ceremonies at the Carmichael mine.\u00a0(Supplied:\u00a0Coedie McAvoy)
", "\"There's always been one Wangan and Jagalingou person inside the circle and no foreign objects except for clothes,\" Mr McAvoy says.", "\"You feel kind of like a genie in a bottle, but I know it's for a purpose.\"", "Bravus has raised safety and trespass concerns, but the Queensland Police Service (QPS) has not removed the group.", "The family is concerned an area their ancestors once used for stonework has been excavated without an archaeological dig or adequate consultation.", "\"This is a knapping site that's been around for thousands of years and they've found artefacts up to 1.5 metres down,\" Mr McAvoy says.", "", "
Drone photos have sparked concerns over the suspected excavation of a knapping site.\u00a0(Supplied: Wangan and Jagalingou Standing Our Ground)
", "Bravus says\u00a0cultural heritage clearances are monitored by a Wangan and Jagalingou committee.", "\"Any insinuation that Bravus has acted inappropriately in managing these areas is a complete fabrication and a smear on our business and the Wangan and Jagalingou Traditional Owners' Cultural Heritage Committee who unanimously approved and oversaw these works,\" a statement said.", "The Queensland government is\u00a0considering whether there are grounds to issue a stop work order after the issue was raised with Minister for Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander Partnerships, Craig Crawford.", "\"We take any allegation of harm to cultural heritage seriously,\" Mr Crawford said in a statement.", "It is understood the Environmental Defender's Office was\u00a0providing information to the Minister this week.", "A representative of the cultural committee has been contacted for comment.", "
'I've asked over and over'
", "In 2016, the Wangan and Jagalingou\u00a0people voted 294 to one in favour of an Indigenous Land Use Agreement (ILUA) with Adani.", "Mine opponents represent a small portion of the traditional owner group, who since signing the agreement have been working with Bravus.", "But McAvoy says people were \"strong-armed\"\u00a0into signing the agreement.", "\"They feel trapped.", "", "
The QPS says it is investigating Bravus' complaints about the camp on the mining lease.(Supplied:\u00a0Coedie McAvoy)
", "Another traditional owner who wasn't at the ILUA vote is Lyndell Turbane.", "She's heartbroken over a lack of communication about cultural findings.", "\"I feel powerless,\" Ms Turbane says.", "Ms Turbane says she's\u00a0seen correspondence from the mine's cultural committee \u2013 and drone photos of an excavation \u2013 which reference\u00a0a \"significant cultural find\".", "Despite being a registered Native Title Applicant, she says information about her people's artefacts has been denied to her.", "\"I've asked over and over and they just don't give me any information.\"", "Neither Bravus nor Mr Crawford's office would confirm what had been found or how it was being preserved.", "
Burial ground, sacred sites preserved\u00a0
", "A rail line spanning almost 200 kilometres from the Carmichael Mine to a port in Bowen has also been constructed as part of the project.", "It mostly passes through the ancestral homelands of the Jangga people.", "Elder\u00a0Colin McLennan says the clan has\u00a0a positive relationship with Bravus, which has led to significant site discoveries\u00a0that have been preserved by diverting the rail line.", "\"It was a good outcome,\" he says.", "A women's quarry site and areas with axes and other stone tools were also found.", "\"When you've got a trained mind and been on the country all your life, you can see what they made out of these [rocks].\"", "
What's next?
", "Mr McAvoy says he will remain at the camp indefinitely \u2013 his ultimate goal is a cessation of operations.", "\"We live in a country where mining is God,\" he says.\u00a0", "\"I've put them in a situation where billions of dollars do not change the situation.\"", "Meanwhile, Bravus says the unauthorised access to a mine area amounts to trespass and is a serious safety breach.", "\"We will continue to ensure that when they do wish to access our properties to undertake cultural practices and ceremonies, they are able to do so in a planned, safe and respectful manner,\" the company said.", "", "
Bravus says it has a deep respect for traditional owners' customs but having the protest camp near mining activities is unsafe.(ABC Tropical North: Angel Parsons)
", "The Queensland Police Service said it was investigating Bravus' complaints.", "\"The QPS acknowledges the cultural and human rights of all persons involved and is undertaking operations to maintain a safe environment while an appropriate response is determined,\" a spokesperson said.", "Bravus says it is still on track to export coal in 2021."]
